name: Aerolitos
description:
How long can you survive?!

In Aerólitos is a casual game in which your goal is to try to survive a shower of aerolites, or meteorites, the longer you can. Make use of the following power ups to avoid being hit by those roc..., I mean Aerolites!!

  • Dash: As the name suggests, this power up moves you forward very fast;
  • Coloratrix: Slow down time to move away from the trajectory of an aerolite;
  • Deflect Shield: Spawn a shield over your head to protect you from the falling aerolites, but be careful with your sides.

Have in mind that these power ups are limited in time and quantity, so make the better use of them.

Let the timer count up as much as you can before depleting your health bar. Challenge your friends and show who is the most skillful!

And remember, these are not rocks, they are Aerolites!!!!

CONTROLS:

  • Move 
    • Keyboard: [A] and  [D] or [Left Arrow] and [Right Arrow]
    • Xbox 360 Controller: [Left Stick] or [Directional Pad]
  • Jump/Double jump
    • Keyboard: [Space]
    • Xbox 360 Controller: [A]
  • Dash
    • Keyboard: [Left Shift]
    • Xbox 360 Controller: [B]
  • Coloratrix
    • Keyboard: [Left Ctrl]
    • Xbox 360 Controller: [X]
  • Deflect Shield
    • Keyboard: [W] or [Up Arrow]
    • Xbox 360 Controller: [Y]
  • Pause
    • Keyboard: [ESC] or [Backspace]
    • Xbox 360 Controller: [Start]

P.S. Other controllers are also supported.

CREDITS:

  • This game is based on an episode of the Mexican comedy TV show "El Chapulín Colorado", created by Roberto Gómez Bolaños and licensed by Televisa.
  • BGMs and some sound effects are from the Brazilian version (Maga) of the TV show. Composers include John Charles Fiddy and Norman John Warren.
  • Game design and programming by Charles Nascimento.
  • Background and aerolite arts by Kenney.
  • Character graphics and animation by Jarquin10.
